changes.step_6: Added two SkillWriter refactor-mode subagent templates (Classify + Execute) after Archivist section, before Worker section. Classify template: read-only scan of foreign workspace instruction files, outputs classification report. Execute template: takes approved_classifications from user review, executes only approved changes. Both include SCOPE BOUNDARIES and SCOPE ESCALATION blocks. ~45 lines added, file now 270 lines.
changes.step_7: Updated mission paragraph at line 25 to mention refactor mode: 'In refactor mode, you analyze existing instruction files in a workspace, classify them (keep, convert to skill, consolidate, delete, or split), and — after user approval — execute the approved changes.' File stays at 266 lines.

data.notes: Step 7 update to 'done' blocked by phase confirmation gate (integration phase requires confirmation before transition). Work is complete but step status shows 'active' instead of 'done'.
